name: penciler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who does the first stage of the drawings for a comic , graphic novel, or animation (= a book or movie whose story is told in pictures), either in pencil or on a computer: Pencilers draw the panels, illustrating the story. I would say I had more interaction with inkers than with pencilers. Compare
colorist (ARTIST)
inker
letterer
More examplesFewer examplesThe penciler creates a deceptively simplistic art style for the series.Then he teamed up with a penciler, inker, and letterer to make "Adventures" a reality.A penciler/inker is as important to comics as a cinematographer is to film.
